Routes 5&20 Hanover, NY 14136 Chautauqua County
Hunt Sign #
2822
Property Type:
Land
Transaction:
Purchase
Price:
$495,000
Contact:
Fred Occhino - Email - 716-880-1918
Description
11 acres ready for development. Daily traffic counts on Route 20 of 18,000 cars and on I-90 of 30,000 cars. Owner will subdivide or lease land for your convenience. Tim Horton’s is on the corner of this property IDA funding may be available.
Area Description
Located 1,000 feet from NYS I-90 Silver Creek exit. Ideal location for hotel, drug store, fast food, restaurant chains or plaza.
